title: Georgia Tech Studies Chickens' Emotions Based On Their Clucks
teaser: When a chicken speaks, it's hard to tell whether it's a happy or sad cluck. That's what a research team at Georgia Tech is trying to decipher by recording more than 1,000 hours of chickens clucking.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
